IntelPCIeDevice.description: The resource shall be used to represents an Intel PCIe Device.
IntelPCIeDevice.longDescription: The resource shall be used to represents an Intel PCIe Device.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

HDRLog0.description: The value of the HDRLog0 field of the PCIe device.
HDRLog0.longDescription: The value of the HDRLog0 field of the PCIe device.

HDRLog1.description: The value of the HDRLog1 field of the PCIe device.
HDRLog1.longDescription: The value of the HDRLog1 field of the PCIe device.

HDRLog2.description: The value of the HDRLog2 field of the PCIe device.
HDRLog2.longDescription: The value of the HDRLog2 field of the PCIe device.

HDRLog3.description: The value of the HDRLog3 field of the PCIe device.
HDRLog3.longDescription: The value of the HDRLog3 field of the PCIe device.

PCIeMarginTestStatus.description: The status of the PCIe Margin Test.
PCIeMarginTestStatus.longDescription: The status of the PCIe Margin Test.

ReplayBufferNumRollover.description: The number of replay buffer rollovers.
ReplayBufferNumRollover.longDescription: The number of replay buffer rollovers.

RxMemoryReadCount.description: The number of read memory transactions received by the device.
RxMemoryReadCount.longDescription: The number of read memory transactions received by the device.

RxMemoryWriteCount.description: The number of write memory transactions received by the device.
RxMemoryWriteCount.longDescription: The number of write memory transactions received by the device.

TxMemoryReadCount.description: The number of read memory transactions transmitted by the device.
TxMemoryReadCount.longDescription: The number of read memory transactions transmitted by the device.

TxMemoryWriteCount.description: The number of write memory transactions transmitted by the device.
TxMemoryWriteCount.longDescription: The number of write memory transactions transmitted by the device.

enumDescriptions.Aborted: The PCIe Margin Test was aborted
enumDescriptions.Dormant: The PCIe Margin Test is dormant
enumDescriptions.InService: The PCIe Margin Test is in service
enumDescriptions.Invalid: The PCIe Margin Test is invalid
enumDescriptions.Starting: The PCIe Margin Test is starting
enumDescriptions.Stopped: The PCIe Margin Test has stopped
enumDescriptions.Stopping: The PCIe Margin Test is stopping

enumLongDescriptions.Aborted: The PCIe Margin Test was aborted
enumLongDescriptions.Dormant: The PCIe Margin Test is dormant
enumLongDescriptions.InService: The PCIe Margin Test is in service
enumLongDescriptions.Invalid: The PCIe Margin Test is invalid
enumLongDescriptions.Starting: The PCIe Margin Test is starting
enumLongDescriptions.Stopped: The PCIe Margin Test has stopped
enumLongDescriptions.Stopping: The PCIe Margin Test is stopping

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

CompletionTimeoutStatus.description: The status of the PCIe completion timeout
CompletionTimeoutStatus.longDescription: The status of the PCIe completion timeout

DLProtocolErorStatus.description: The status of the PCIe data link protocol error
DLProtocolErorStatus.longDescription: The status of the PCIe data link protocol error

ECRCErrorStatus.description: The status of the PCIe ECRC error
ECRCErrorStatus.longDescription: The status of the PCIe ECRC error

FlowControlProtocolErrorStatus.description: The status of the PCIe flow control protocol error
FlowControlProtocolErrorStatus.longDescription: The status of the PCIe flow control protocol error

MalformedTLPErrorStatus.description: The status of the PCIe malformed transaction layer packet error
MalformedTLPErrorStatus.longDescription: The status of the PCIe malformed transaction layer packet error

PCIeReceiverStatus.description: The status of the PCIe receiver
PCIeReceiverStatus.longDescription: The status of the PCIe receiver

PCIeReplayTimerTimeoutStatus.description: The status of the PCIe replay timer timeout
PCIeReplayTimerTimeoutStatus.longDescription: The status of the PCIe replay timer timeout

ReceiverOverFlowErrorStatus.description: The status of the PCIe receiver overflow error
ReceiverOverFlowErrorStatus.longDescription: The status of the PCIe receiver overflow error

SurpriseLinkDownErrorStatus.description: The status of the PCIe surprise link down error
SurpriseLinkDownErrorStatus.longDescription: The status of the PCIe surprise link down error

UncorrectableInternalErrorStatus.description: The status of the PCIe uncorrectable internal error
UncorrectableInternalErrorStatus.longDescription: The status of the PCIe uncorrectable internal error
